dcterms:description: Rain100H consists of 1800 rainy/clean pairs as training images and 200 rainy/clean pairs as test images, where the rainy images are synthesized with five directions of rain streaks.
dcterms:title: Rain100H

dcterms:creator: W. Yang
R. T. Tan
J. Feng
J. Liu
Z. Guo
S. Yan
dcterms:description: Rain100L consists of 1800 training images and 200 test images, where the rainy images are synthesized with only one type of rain streaks.
dcterms:title: Rain100L

dcterms:creator: H. Zhang
V. Sindagi
V. M. Patel
dcterms:description: Rain800 consists of 800 images, where 700 rainy/clean pairs are used as training samples and the remainder as testing. The rainy images are created by adding rain streaks to clean images with various intensities and orientations.
dcterms:title: Rain800
